item.description:
I apologize for not posting this information sooner!

We'll enter the Breakheart Reservation at the Hemlock Road entrance. It's directly next to the Wakefield vocational high school. Per Lisbeth, who suggested this location:

Turn onto Hemlock road (school will now be on your left and the fields on right); continue straight past landrigan field; stay to right of entryway and continue straight to end of parking lot as you enter another high school building parking lot; there is an entrance to the reservation on the right; since it will be Saturday you can park anywhere with no problem.

If you get to the reservation and can't find anyone, please call my cell phone: 781-799-9935.

***************WEATHER NOTICE********************

In case of thunderstorms, please feel free to call me to in the morning. If it's pouring and/or a thunderstorm, I will post a cancellation on the Meetup website and email everyone NLT 9:00. But if it's drizzling, etc., I'd like people to call me (or email) and let me know their thoughts. If we have to cancel, I will try to reschedule for next weekend.

Hope to see you tomorrow!
Laura & Molly

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel June Meetup
